Container.Name: speed-log
Container.Overview: Speed Log is a simple application that displays speed test runs over time.
Container.Description: Speed Log is a simple application that displays speed test runs over time.[br][br] Speed Log will run its dashboard on port 9090.[br][br] [b][span style='color: #E80000;']Directions:[/span][/b][br] [b]/data[/b] : in this path, Speed Log will store it's configuration files.

Config.Name: Data Directory
Config.Description: This path is where Speed Log will store it's configuration files.
